Description:
Gorgeous Townhouse on the Melbourne Side of Bendigo
This newly completed townhouse is a beautiful example of modern living. Stepping into the entry foyer you will instantly be impressed with how spacious the home feels. Neutral tones throughout will appeal to most as will the smart floor plan.
Features include:
Ground floor
• Study just inside the front entrance, ideal for those who work from home
• Huge living room, full of light coming from a highset window
• Open plan dining/kitchen/living.
• The kitchen is comprised of 600mm stainless steel electric oven and gas cooktop, dishwasher, double sink, pantry and plenty
of space for dining table.
• Off the dining, through glass sliding doors is a concreted area for outdoor entertaining.
• Laundry and conveniently, a toilet with its own vanity, access from the double garage with remote roller door.
Top floor
• 2nd living area with highset windows
• Main bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite comprising of double vanity, shower and toilet
• Bedrooms 2 and 3 both have built in robes
• Main bathroom with bath, shower and vanity
• Separate toilet
Climate control is catered for by way of ducted evaporative cooling and gas ducted heating. The allotment is 287m2 in total, fully fenced and ready for landscaping.
Close to Lansell Square shopping centre, Kangaroo Flat CBD, schools, child care, medical facilities, public transport, parks and recreation areas including the new Kangaroo Flat Leisure Centre when it is complete.
First home buyers are eligible to take advantage of the stamp duty savings!
Insights: 8/17 Grantham Terrace, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Immaculate luxurious family home
This home is in such immaculate condition you could easily be mistaken for thinking that the home was brand new! With an abundance of street appeal, a stylish, smart, open living floor plan and gorgeous established manicured gardens, this home is sure to capture the attention of the market. Features include: Main bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite. The two remaining bedrooms come with built in robes. The main bathroom with bath, shower and vanity is conveniently located close to the second and third bedrooms. There are two spacious living areas. Kitchen comprised of 900mm free standing stainless steel electric oven with gas cook top, dishwasher and plenty of bench space. Adjoining the kitchen is the dining and family room. Sliding doors off the dining area lead you to the alfresco. Set amongst the lovely established garden, this is the perfect spot to entertain or to enjoy some relaxation in the warmer months. The gardens are easily maintained with the in-ground watering system. A double garage with remote access and interior access to the home provides secure off street parking. Only a short walk to the local primary school, secondary school and childcare facilities, close to Lansell Square shopping centre, minutes from the train station, conveniently located on the Melbourne side of Bendigo and within walking distance of the new leisure centre, this home ticks a lot of boxes! Don't hesitate to contact us to arrange an inspection. Homes like this don't stay for sale for very long .
Insights: 11 Klim Avenue, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
LOVE THY NEIGHBOURHOOD
Here is a fabulous opportunity to break into a popular Kangaroo Flat area with this ideal first home, downsizer or investment property.
Located in a family-friendly neighbourhood opposite the Byambee Rises parkland and playground, the brick veneer home is comfortable and spacious. It features three big bedrooms (with robes), family bathroom, large formal lounge room off the tiled entry, generous kitchen/meals area and ducted heating and cooling.
The kitchen includes gas cooktop, electric wall oven, dishwasher, pantry and broom cupboards, long island bench/breakfast bar and a clear view of the backyard.
Outside, a rear deck overlooks the huge child and pet-proof backyard and the remote double garage includes rear drive through access making it easy to add future shedding, extend the house or put in a pool if desired.
Superbly located within walking distance to Centro Lansell Shopping Centre, Rocklea Homemaker Centre, Bunnings and Harvey Norman with local strip shopping facilities and schools nearby and easy access to Castlemaine and Melbourne.

Description:
Lovely home with large workshop on 857m2
- Very nice 3 bedroom family home on a great 857m2 block
- Open plan living with kitchen/meals and lounge area
- Fabulous 857m2 block with large 6m x 8.5m workshop with concrete and power
- Great location overlooking a bush reserve
- Single carport plus workshop for 3 to 4 vehicles in total
- Fantastic yard and garden that will please all
- Close to schools, shops, supermarket and all amenities
- Airconditioner and gas heating
- Very well presented home - to suit many families
This lovely home in a quiet area overlooking a bush reserve is ideal for a family or tradie. Yes, an 857m2 block with large workshop. Yarunga Drive is situated just off Crusoe Road and is close to all amenities. The large yard and workshop is perfect for the tradie or growing family.

Description:
Homely pride with family size choices
Only a few minutes drive to Kangaroo Flat shopping centre and local schools. This well maintained B/V home offers 3 bedrooms, main with walk in robes.Central three piece bathroom. Separate lounge. Ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling. Functional kitchen with gas cooking and dishwasher. The generous sized family and dining room open onto a delightful enclosed outdoor entertaining area complete with fish pond.Drive through the oversized single carport with remote door to access the single garage with pot belly stove. Fully secure yard with established gardens, wood shed and garden shed. The home is located on the service road for safe and easy access.

Description:
Affordable buying in Kangaroo Flat
This charming home provides a great opportunity for those wanting to enter the housing market for the first time or invest in a home that is close to all amenities. Situated on an approx. 614m2 corner block, the home has loads of potential to add a large extension, shed or even a pool. Comprising of 3 bedrooms, plus renovated modern kitchen with good cupboard space, dishwasher and pantry.
Updated bathroom with a glorious claw foot bath, 9 foot ceilings, floor boards throughout most of the home and split system heating and cooling.
Outside features include a carport, garden shed and fully fenced yard with great side access for a tradie vehicle or caravan. Situated in a quiet location and only 1 kilometre from Lansell Square, Aldi supermarket, Botanical Gardens and train station. This affordable and solid home, with the potential to sub-divide (STCA) is worth your early inspection.

Description:
QUALITY BUILT TOWNHOUSE IN QUIET LOCATION
If you're a first home buyer or looking for an investment property or just looking to down size, this well built town house is situated on is own title and sure to impress. Featuring 2 comfortable bedrooms both with built-in-robes, a functional kitchen with ample storage, a comfortable dining area adjoins the kitchen and a separate living area. You will also find evaporative cooling throughout and a gas wall heater. Outside is double carport and a low maintenance rear yard with garden shed. This property allows easy access to the city centre, schools, shops and the Bendigo Regional park is at the end of the street.

Description:
Priority package
If size is what matters most on your list of important priorities, then you can't go past this 4 bedroom property. Extremely rarely within city streets do vast expanses of affordable land become available, let alone with a huge family home as well as a massive shed! Yet here on 1371m2, is a tremendously roomy residence with garage and 13x8 metre shed with concrete floor, power, double roller door and security system! Indoors, this welcoming home has 9' ceilings and timber cathedral ceilings that soar overhead, as Tasmanian oak dados line some of the walls. Heating and cooling are ducted throughout, while a gas cooktop and electric wall oven along with dishwasher are employed in the kitchen.Positioned on a corner permits direct vehicle access to the massive fully-fenced backyard, where remote-controlled gates are a clever inclusion. Making the yard all the more inviting, merbau decking overlooks gardens watered by sprinkler system via pump to 2 rainwater tanks, together totalling approximately 10,000 litre capacity. Only a 6 minute cycle or a 20 minute walk will get the kids to school. It's even less to shops and health services or a little more to catch a train. If driving to commute to the big smoke or most other major towns or cities, this handy location close to several highways to almost anywhere around Victoria, then lead you back home, sweet home again!
Insights: 11 Muriel Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Only a 6 minute cycle or a 20 minute walk will get the kids to school. It's even less to shops and health services or a little more to catch a train. If driving to commute to the big smoke or most other major towns or cities, this handy location close to several highways to almost anywhere around Victoria, then lead you back home, sweet home again!
Insights: 11 Muriel Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Original 3 bedroom BV home with shed on huge block
Established and set on over 800m2 of land is this 3 bedroom brick veneer home, positioned in popular Kangaroo Flat, with so many amenities conveniently placed a short stroll or drive away.
Original in condition, the home's solid foundation to work with will only benefit its next owner, both in the long and short term.
Tidy enough to move into, you will enjoy the open lounge and kitchen/meals, overlooking the outdoor sitting area via a glass slider.
All 3 bedrooms have built-in cupboards and are of a great size.
Heating and cooling provided, separate toilet to the 3 piece bathroom, and laundry.
Outside is a double carport, huge side access through double gates to tradesman's shed (no concrete and no power), various aviaries, water tank and all so close to schools, public transport, Kangaroo Flat shops and Lansell Square.

Description:
Neat home on a generous lot.
Neat and tidy brick veneer located at the quiet end of Browning Street close to public transport, schools etc.
It offers three bedrooms, all with robes, spacious lounge and galley-style kitchen with big breakfast bar separating it from the meals area.
Kitchen is equipped with gas cooker, near new Miele dishwasher and plenty of storage. Meals and lounge areas both open to a paved and covered alfresco area for seamless outdoor living and entertaining.
Bathroom and laundry are centrally placed with two gas heaters and ducted evaporative air conditioning circulating for year-round comfort.
Set on an easily managed 667 square metre (approx.) block with secure lawn areas for toddlers or pets and side access to the backyard for off-street parking for caravan, trailer etc.
It's safe to say that the hard work replacing the gutters on a build of this age has already been done with fresh external paintwork to finish.
The spacious garage comfortably fits a car whilst still providing room to tinker about on the fixed workbench with electricity already in place.
Everything about the property is low maintenance making it an ideal first home, investment proposition or the perfect home base for grey nomads to lock up and leave between trips.
It already has a proven rental history with a current rental appraisal of approx. $300.00 per week and is ready for immediate new ownership.

Fine garden-set family lifestyle

Flawless presentation, beautiful natural light and modern tones are recurring themes throughout the free-flowing floorplan including a formal lounge, study and generous open-plan family/dining area. A galley kitchen featuring electric oven, gas cook-tops, walk-in pantry and island bench serves in style, whilst a huge covered alfresco and secluded yard create the perfect settings for outdoor entertaining. The main bedroom (WIR and ensuite) with bay window is zoned privately from 3 further bedrooms, all appointed with BIR's. Luxuriously finished with study, alarm system, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, data points throughout, double garage and set up for ducted vacuuming.

Description:
Location is Everything
This newly subdivided block is in such a perfect position for downsizers, first home buyers or investors. Being of 365sqm and off a service road you have the convenience of being close to shops but still have peace and quiet with no busy highway noise. Kangaroo Flat's shopping centre, Centro Lansell, is a mere 290 metres from your doorstep, a quick 4 minute stroll and you are there. For the nature lovers, Crusoe Resivour & No. 7 Park under 3km away. There is also the convenience of jumping straight on the highway and being in Melbourne in 1 hour and 40 minutes, while Bendigo CBD is only a 10 minute drive in the other direction. All services are available at this property. Call now to inspect.

Description:
FLAWLESS FAMILY CLASSIC
Expansive nineties style domain meets modern day expectations with great success.
Not only big on the inside, the property sits on a block approximately 2,600 square metres with natural bushland and a tree-lined seasonal creek on the rear boundary.
With a total floor area of 44 sq (including front and rear verandahs, double garage and utility room), the home has a character all its own.
There's room to grow and space to play for all ages with four bedrooms (all with robes), two bathrooms, two spacious living areas, updated kitchen and dining area plus extensive outdoor living areas.
Updated kitchen includes stainless steel pyrolitic oven, gas cooktop, integrated microwave, Bosch dishwasher, walk-in pantry and big stone-topped island bench while soaring timber-lined cathedral ceilings with exposed beams add a sense of space to all living areas.
The main suite incorporating ensuite and big walk-in robe is separately positioned beside the formal lounge and dining rooms with remaining bedrooms, family bathroom and oversized laundry at the opposite end.
Included creature comforts are wood and gas heating, 2 x split systems, ducted evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum, security system and 1.5Kw solar power.
Relaxed outdoor entertaining and family fun is assured with a large covered alfresco deck fringed with ferns overlooking the big backyard where there's plenty of room for a pool or tennis court if desired.
Rainwater tanks and a sprinkler system maintain the sweeping lawns and established trees while the remote double garage houses the family fleet and new a Colorbond shed 4 m x 8m stores caravans, trucks or trailers.
The location offers an idyllic bush-like setting only a two-minute drive to Centro Lansell shopping, Big Hill Primary school and a one-hour drive from Calder Park for Melbourne commuters.
Insights: 69 Phillis Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Quarter Acre Investment
This property is perfect for starting or expanding your Property Portfolio. Situated on a huge approx.1050 sqm block in booming Kangaroo Flat (with High Street frontage) this property is ripe for development (STCA). Add to this the bonus that the existing house is a solid weatherboard home currently tenanted at $260 a week- what have you got to lose! Even if you buy now and develop at your leisure...
The comfortable home has three bedrooms (all BIR), a spacious lounge with a gas log fire and refrigerated air conditioner, renovated timber kitchen with ample bench space, dishwasher and gas/electric cooking. The fully tiled bathroom is clean and neat with shower, vanity and toilet. Polished floorboards enhance the living areas and the bedrooms are carpeted. There is an existing 8mx3m shed with power and concrete to one side of the block.
Of interest to an investor is the large, flat expanse of yard at the back of the house and the 3.5m driveway that provides access to it- making it an easy prospect to develop (STCA) whilst leaving the existing home untouched at the front.

Description:
Potential Plus
POTENTIAL is a word that perfectly sums up this home in the heart of Kangaroo Flat.
It’s definitely the kind of place you could enjoy living in in this central location. Or you might choose to rent it out for a year or two while you make your plans. Either way, at this price, it’s a solid investment.
Situated on a corner allotment, this home offers three bedrooms all with ceiling fans and of generous size.
Further in, generous space has been allotted to kitchen, family and meals zones. The kitchen has an upright electric oven with gas cook-top and dishwasher all surrounded by ample storage including a large pantry and great bench space.
Gas ducted heating and ducted evaporative cooling along with a gas heater in the lounge keeps things comfy all year round.
Freshly painted inside and new carpet throughout, it will provide its new owners with a blank canvas to add their own touches.
At the rear of the home is a wonderful 8 x 8-metre undercover alfresco area for entertaining.
Plenty of provision is available for vehicle accommodation. There’s a double carport and workshop with power, concrete floor and lights, with side access through double gates facing Baslar Court.
Being in a central location, essentials such as supermarkets, pharmacies, public transport and multiple school options are within easy reach.

Description:
Stylish, Period Appeal!
Seize the opportunity to secure this exquisite Victorian home which has been immaculately kept, maintained and updated beautifully. Beyond this charming facade of the timber frame porch, which features cast iron latticework, red & blue stained glass windows and entry door, lies a bright and inviting home offering 3 large bedrooms, the master bedroom completed with built-in-robes and pressed metal feature on the walls, central bathroom which includes a shower over bath and vanity, the laundry and toilet are separately located. Featuring a spacious kitchen and meals area that is complimented with a showpiece ceiling and elaborate cornice, the home also offers a separate living that is also of decent size. This enchanting period home is full of original character, some of these original features include stunning leadlight glass work, red & blue stained glass windows and doors, ceiling rosettes, large & elaborate skirting, architraves and cornices and let’s not forget the beautiful ornate fireplaces with timber surrounds. Baltic pine polished floorboards, soaring ceilings throughout and 2 split systems that provide year-round comfort making this a smart investment or fantastic home to live in and enjoy! Complete this dream home with a large picket and hedge for complete privacy and minimal noise exposure.
Positioned on a good-size allotment with off-street parking and minimal maintenance yard, this one is not to be missed!
Close to all shops, schools and public transport including the train station only 1km away!
Insights: 11 High Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.
